headline.main: NAMED TO DIRECT BRITISH PUBLICITY; Sir Gerald Campbell to Change System in This Country

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 2 -- Sir Gerald Campbell, British Minister and second in rank to Viscount Halifax here, has been selected to reorganize and direct all British publicity in America. Sir Gerald, it was said, will be directly under the British Ministry of Information at London.
abstract: Sir G Campbell resigns as Min to U S on apptmt as Brit Information Services dir-gen in U S
